name: mailersoft
description: MailerSoft (http://www.mailersoft.com) transactional email API client for node
readme:
# Install

### With NPM

```sh
npm install mailersoft
```

### From source

```sh
git clone https://github.com/mailersoft/mailersoft-nodejs.git
cd mailersoft-nodejs
npm install
```

# Usage

```javascript
var mailersoft = require('mailersoft');

mailersoft
	.setApiKey('c17c54d0763a096d58cd988bcddf7ae6')
	.setVariables({
		'welcome' => '', 
		'confirmLink' => '' 
	})
	.setRecipient( 'sample.email@gmail.com', 'Sample Client')
	.setMail( 10690 )
	.send();
```
